Lawsuits from startups alleging anti-competitive practices

Priceless Planet Coalition to address climate change
social_issues: Consumer trust issues due to cybersecurity threats
Impact of legal disputes on public perception
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and ongoing legal challenges
